name: Radical Road
description:
Turn, grind, and drive your way to the top. Radical Road is an easy to learn but hard to master single button arcade game!
The objective is to go as far as you can on an infinitely procedurally generated road!
Along the way you will have to turn and grind with the correct timing to avoid bailing out!
The further you go the faster the car goes and the more points you rack up!


The further you go the more coins you will collect!
You can then use said coins to unlock a variety of EPIC skins for your vehicle
so you can ride in style. All the skins you unlock feature distinct visual effects and more!


Compete with your friends or take on the world on the global leaderboard,
compete with your friends to see who can be the MOST RADICALLEST roader around!
